languages.text: {n}Иеронимус незаметно кивает вам и складывает руки в аквилу.{/n}
{n}Hieronymus nods at you surreptitiously and folds his hands into the sign of the Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Иеронимус незаметно кивает вам и складывает руки в аквилу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯偷偷地朝你点了点头，双手比了个双头鹰手势。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods at you surreptitiously and folds his hands into the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスはひっそりとあなたに向かって頷き、手でアクィラの印を作った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods at you surreptitiously and folds his hands into the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスはひっそりとあなたに向かって頷き、手でアクィラの印を作った。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus te asiente a escondidas y dobla sus manos en el signo del Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods at you surreptitiously and folds his hands into the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus te asiente a escondidas y sus manos hacen el signo del Aquila.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus nickt dir unauffällig zu und macht das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods at you surreptitiously and folds his hands into the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus nickt dir unauffällig zu und macht das Zeichen des Aquila.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus vous adresse un hochement de tête furtif et forme de ses mains le signe de l'Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods at you surreptitiously and folds his hands into the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus, kimseye belli etmeden onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor ve elleriyle Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor.{/n}
